JoinedArea.Thai: : (?<player>.*?) เข้าสู่พื้นที่

TradeItemPrice.English: (((Hi, )?I would like to buy your)|wtb) (?<name>.*) listed for (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) in (?<league>.*) \(stash( tab)? "(?<stash>.*)";( position:)? left (?<left>\d*), top (?<top>\d*)\)(?<message>.*)?
TradeItemPrice.Portuguese: Olá, eu gostaria de comprar o seu item (?<name>.*) listado por (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) na (?<league>.*) \(aba do baú: "(?<stash>.*)"; posição: esquerda (?<left>\d*), topo (?<top>\d*)\)(?<message>.*)?
TradeItemPrice.Russian: Здравствуйте, хочу купить у вас (?<name>.*) за (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) в лиге (?<league>.*) \(секция "(?<stash>.*)"; позиция: (?<left>\d*) столбец, (?<top>\d*) ряд\)(?<message>.*)?
TradeItemPrice.Thai: สวัสดี, เราต้องการจะชื้อของคุณ (?<name>.*) ใน ราคา (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) ใน (?<league>.*) \(stash tab "(?<stash>.*)"; ตำแหน่ง: ซ้าย (?<left>\d*), บน (?<top>\d*)\)(?<message>.*)?
TradeItemPrice.German: Hi, ich möchte '(?<name>.*)' zum angebotenen Preis von (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) in der (?<league>.*)-Liga kaufen \(Truhenfach "(?<stash>.*)"; Position: (?<left>\d*) von links, (?<top>\d*) von oben\)(?<message>.*)?
TradeItemPrice.French: Bonjour, je souhaiterais t'acheter (?<name>.*) pour (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) dans la ligue (?<league>.*) \(onglet de réserve "(?<stash>.*)" ; (?<left>\d*)e en partant de la gauche, (?<top>\d*)e en partant du haut\)(?<message>.*)?
TradeItemPrice.Spanish: Hola, quisiera comprar tu (?<name>.*) listado por (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) en (?<league>.*) \(pestaña de alijo "(?<stash>.*)"; posición: izquierda(?<left>\d*), arriba (?<top>\d*)\)(?<message>.*)?
TradeItemPrice.Korean: 안녕하세요, 환영\(보관함 탭 "(?<stash>.*)", 위치: 왼쪽 (?<left>\d*), 상단 (?<top>\d*)\)에 (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*)\(으\)로 올려놓은(?<name>.*)\(을\)를 구매하고 싶습니다(?<message>.*)?

TradeItemNoPrice.French: Bonjour, je souhaiterais t'acheter (?<name>.*) dans la ligue (?<league>.*) \(onglet de réserve "(?<stash>.*)" ; (?<left>\d*)e en partant de la gauche, (?<top>\d*)e en partant du haut\)(?<message>.*)?
TradeItemNoPrice.Spanish: Hola, quisiera comprar tu (?<name>.*) en (?<league>.*) \(pestaña de alijo "(?<stash>.*)"; posición: izquierda(?<left>\d*), arriba (?<top>\d*)\)(?<message>.*)?
TradeItemNoPrice.Korean: 안녕하세요, 환영\(보관함 탭 "(?<stash>.*)", 위치: 왼쪽 (?<left>\d*), 상단 (?<top>\d*)\)에 (?<name>.*)\(을\)를 구매하고 싶습니다(?<message>.*)?

TradeBulk.English: ((Hi, )?I'd like to buy your) (?<count>\d*) (?<name>.*) for my (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) in (?<league>.*)\.(?<message>.*)?
TradeBulk.Portuguese: Olá, eu gostaria de comprar seu\(s\) (?<count>\d*) (?<name>.*) pelo\(s\) meu\(s\) (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) na (?<league>.*)\.(?<message>.*)?
TradeBulk.Russian: Здравствуйте, хочу купить у вас (?<count>\d*) (?<name>.*) за (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) в лиге (?<league>.*)\.(?<message>.*)?
TradeBulk.Thai: สวัสดี เรามีความต้องการจะชื้อ  (?<count>\d*) (?<name>.*) ของคุณ ฉันมี (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) ใน (?<league>.*)\.(?<message>.*)?
TradeBulk.German: Hi, ich möchte '(?<count>\d*) (?<name>.*)' zum angebotenen Preis von (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) in der (?<league>.*)-Liga kaufen\.(?<message>.*)?
TradeBulk.French: Bonjour, je voudrais t'acheter (?<count>\d*) (?<name>.*) contre (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) dans la ligue (?<league>.*)\.(?<message>.*)?
TradeBulk.Spanish: Hola, me gustaría comprar tu\(s\) (?<count>\d*) (?<name>.*) por mi (?<price>\d*([.|,]\d*)?) (?<currency>.*) en (?<league>.*)\.(?<message>.*)?

TradeMap.Universal: I'd like to exchange my (?<tier1>[IVX]*): \((?<maps1>(.*(,)?))\) for your (?<tier2>[IVX]*): \((?<maps2>(.*(,)?))\) in (?<league>.*)\.(?<message>.*)?
